pages.text: The $(item)Air Compressor/$ is a simple generator which can produce $(l:base_concepts/pressure)compressed air/$. It will burn any solid fuel that a vanilla $(item)Furnace/$ will accept, to produce a $(ttcolor)$(t:This can be increased by installing Speed Upgrades)base/$ 10mL air/tick.$(p)It will $(italic)not/$ accept $(item)Lava Buckets/$ or indeed any bucket containing liquid fuels; use a $(l:compressors/liquid_compressor)Liquid Compressor/$ for that.
